snippet.title: Avowed Story Trailer - Xbox Games Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Coming in 2024. Explore the Living Lands, a mysterious island filled with adventure and danger. As an envoy of Aedyr, you are sent to investigate rumors of a spreading plague with a secret that threatens to destroy everything. Can you save the island and your soul from the forces threatening to tear them apart? Play Day One with Xbox Game Pass or Wishlist today. https://www.xbox.com/games/avowed

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
